Package tools.httpserver.custom

Specific pages adaptation for GreasySpoon administration

See:
          Description

Class Summary
PackagesManagement Class used to backup/restore configuration
PageUsers HTML manipulation dedicated to GreasySpon service.
Generate HTML tags for GreasySpoon scripts list.
Replace <!--content--> tag by generated HMTL list.
ProjectSpecifics Centralize specific project properties access
RequestsManager HTTP server logic Manages custom operation on GET and POST requests
ScriptCheckerPage HTML manipulation dedicated to GreasySpon service.
Allows to display/edit script checker content.
ScriptList HTML manipulation dedicated to GreasySpon service.
Generate HTML tags for GreasySpoon scripts list.
Replace <!--content--> tag by generated HMTL list.
ScriptsInfoPage Generate HTML content dedicated to GreasySpoon service
Includes some system parameters: OS, architecture, memory
Replace any HTML <!--versions--> tag by generated HTML info
